title: EECS Licklider Best Undergraduate Researcher Award (2021)
description: Awarded by the MIT EECS department for my research contribution to the Lenticular Object project.

title: EECS Best Undergraduate Research Award (Best SuperUROP Award 2019)
description: Awarded by the MIT EECS department for being one of the top three performers in SuperUROP, a two-semester research class for students interested in a research career.

title: Leiserchess Performance Engineering Award 2018
description: Awarded by the class staff of 6.172 Performance Engineering of Software Systems for designing and implementing the fastest chess-bot in class.
